page.title: 20SCHOOLS IN THE AREA.
page.content: There are four schools in the area, all of them in or about West Kirby. Two of these schools Dormie House School, and Avalon School are private schools whilst the other two St.Bridgets Church of England Primary School and Calday Grange Grammar School are in the state system. Calday Grammar School for boys is a large Grammar school of about 900 pupils and is one of the very oldest schools in the region. It may be of interest that at the time of writing our area is still using the 11+ test for the selection of childrens secondary education. The pupils of St.Bridgets Primary School and the pupils of Calday Grange Grammar School have been responsible for the compilation of the information used in these entries.
